org.universalradio.tuner

Interface Tuner


  • public interface Tuner

    Author:
    Fabian Sattler, IRT GmbH

      De-Initializes the tuner.

      Retrieve the currently known RadioServices of this Tuner

    • Method Detail

      • initializeTuner

        void initializeTuner()
        Initializes the Tuner. This call is asynchronously. Register a TunerListener for updates on the TunerStatus.

      • suspendTuner

        void suspendTuner()
        Suspends the tuner. Keeping its current status to be resumed later.

      • resumeTuner

        void resumeTuner()
        Resume the suspended tuner to the last state.

      • deInitializeTuner

        void deInitializeTuner()
        De-Initializes the tuner.

      • getTunerType

        TunerType getTunerType()
        Indicates the type of tuner
        Returns:
        the TunerType of this Tuner

      • getTunerStatus

        TunerStatus getTunerStatus()
        Indicates the current status of the Tuner device
        Returns:
        the current TunerStatus

      • getRadioServices

        java.util.List<RadioService> getRadioServices()
        Retrieve the currently known RadioServices of this Tuner
        Returns:
        a list of RadioServices or an empty list

      • startRadioServiceScan

        void startRadioServiceScan()
        Start a scan for available RadioServices

      • stopRadioServiceScan

        void stopRadioServiceScan()
        Stops a currently running RadioService scan

      • startRadioService

        void startRadioService(RadioService radioService)
        Start a RadioService on this tuner
        Parameters:
        radioService - the RadioService to start

      • stopRadioService

        void stopRadioService()
        Stop the currently running RadioService on this tuner

      • getCurrentRunningRadioService

        RadioService getCurrentRunningRadioService()
        Retrieve the currently running RadioService
        Returns:
        the currently running RadioService or null if no RadioService is running

      • subscribe

        void subscribe(TunerListener tunerListener)
        Subscribe a TunerListener to receive updates of this tuner
        Parameters:
        tunerListener - the TunerListener to subscribe

      • unsubscribe

        void unsubscribe(TunerListener tunerListener)
        Unsubscribe a TunerListener
        Parameters:
        tunerListener - the TunerListener to unsubscribe
